description.en: CLV is a one-stop infrastructure platform for cross-chain and decentralized applications. The CLV chain is a Substrate-based specialized Layer-1 chain that is EVM compatible, cross-chain interoperable, and also functions as a Parachain in the Polkadot ecosystem. CLV wallet is a cross-chain all-in-one wallet, for Day-to-Day, DeFi, Metaverse and Gaming purposes. With multi-dimensional products lineup, including CLV Multi-Chain Wallets, CLV dApp Interaction Protocol, CLV Chain EVM and Universal Cross-Chain Support, CLV uniquely positioned itself as “Passport to the Omniverse.”
